title: Mug And Cover, ca. 1800
provenance: Good & Hutchinson, Dennisport, Mass. (Mid-Winter Antiques Show); WPW 1962
description: Ovoid body; flared foot, fluted, with radial cutting on bottom; loop handl cut with notches; domed lid with tall faceted finial; body cut with centralband of swags, printies, & a tiny diamond background, a band of diamonds above and prismatic rings and flat fluting below; glass greenish, light.

tombstone.epitaph:
Mug And Cover, ca. 1800.
ca. 1800. glass. Bequest of Walter Phelps Warren. 1986-61-104-a,b.
